SEARCH

Package com.example

package com.example
  • Class
    Description
    AlertView
    A utility class responsible for displaying system dialog boxes (alerts) within the JavaFX user interface.
    Board
    Represents the logical structure of a Go board.
    ClientHandler
    Handles the server-side connection for a single player.
    Command
    Interface for the Command design pattern.
    ConsoleView
    Provides a text-based interface for displaying game status and debugging.
    Game
    Core engine class managing the logic and flow of a Go game session.
    GoApplication
    Main JavaFX application class for the Go game client.
    GoClient
    Handles network communication on the client side.
    GoServer
    Singleton server class that manages the game session lifecycle.
    MoveCommand
    Implementation of the Command pattern representing a move action.
    PassCommand
    Implementation of the Command pattern representing a pass action.
    ResumeCommand
    Implementation of the Command pattern representing a resume action.
    RuleEngine
    Handles the specific rules and logic of the game of Go.
    StoneColor
    Enumeration defining the possible states of a board intersection.
    SurrenderCommand
    Implementation of the Command pattern representing a surrender action.
